Scribe Agent Configuration

        <store>
           category=_audit
           type=buffer
           tier=agent
           window_size=60
           target_write_size=20480
           max_write_interval=60
           buffer_send_rate=1
           retry_interval=30
           retry_interval_range=10
           must_succeed=yes
           replay_buffer=yes
           <primary>
              type=network
              remote_host=10.14.118.98
              remote_port=12000
           </primary>
           <secondary>
              type=file
              fs_type=std
              file_path=<spooling directory of scribe agent>/_audit
              base_filename=_audit
              max_size=100000000
           </secondary>
        </store>

Note: In production, please apply the entire set of configuration EXACTLY as mentioned above. You can configure the values of following options:

  1. 'retry_interval': should be same as in default store
  2. 'retry_interval_range': should be same as in default store
  3. 'remote_host' in <primary> section: MUST be same as in the <primary> section of default store
  4. 'remote_port' in <primary> section: MUST be same as in the <primary> section of default store
  5. 'file_path' in <secondary> section: MUST be of the format <spooling directory of scribe agent>/_audit. E.g:- /var/spool/databus/_audit
